text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE SECRETARY
March 10, 1959
Mr. William G. Harley
President, NAEB
WHA-TV
University of Wisconsin
Madison, Wisconsin
Dear Bills
Thanks for your note concerning members indi¬
vidual membership in NAEB. As a matter of fact, this
has been one of those things I have been intending to
do every day and have held off because not only am I
but our entire full-time staff and some of our key
part-time people are joining. I anticipate that we
will have eight or nine individual memberships from
KUED.
I apologize for taking so long to get my member¬
ship in, necessitating a bit of your energy in reminding
me.
Sincer Ly,
ngar
KME.dw
